Uses of Package
common.classification

  • Packages that use common.classification 
    Package Description
    bayes.classifiers  
    common.classification  
  • Classes in common.classification used by bayes.classifiers 
    Class and Description
    ClassificationResult
    Objects of this class are used to store the results of a single classification experiment.
    Classifier
    Any model learned to perform a supervised classificiation task should implement this interface so that it can be integrated into an experimental/ learning framework.
